nodes.text: Pollus Avesta was a Human male from Makeb, and the younger brother of the planet's head of state, Shalim Avesta.

During the Conquest of Makeb, Pollus Avesta commanded the family's troops in the field against the Hutt Cartel and the InterStellar Regulators. In order to arrange a distraction so that they could harvest the planet's supply of isotope-5, the Sith Empire worked with Avesta to arrange a planet-wide revolt against the Hutts. Though skeptical of the Empire's motives, Avesta agreed to organize a coordinated strike against Cartel and Regulator forces.
Female Imperial players have the option to flirt with him.
